caffeinatedsoda.name: Caffeinated Soda
caffeinatedsoda.description: Sets all your current cooldowns to 0, but adds whatever they were at to your next cooldowns.

decaf.name: Decaf
decaf.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Cole Brew or a coffeeshop worker. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

beepingpager.name: Beeping Pager
beepingpager.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain medical staff. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

spicymintgum.name: Spicy Mint Gum
spicymintgum.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be ADOFAI related. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

butterypopcorn.name: Buttery Popcorn
butterypopcorn.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be animated. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain a bird. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

clownnose.name: Clown Nose
clownnose.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be humorous or a meme card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

fancyteaset.name: Fancy Tea Set
fancyteaset.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Samurai or Insomniac. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

lunarrocks.name: Lunar Rocks
lunarrocks.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Miner or Lucia. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

secretadmirersnote.name: Secret Admirers Note
secretadmirersnote.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Logan or Hailey. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

stickontabs.name: Stick-on Tabs
stickontabs.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be an editor card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

tapiocapudding.name: Tapioca Pudding
tapiocapudding.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Mr. or Mrs. Stevenson. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

oldfiles.name: Old Files
oldfiles.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be a Discontinued card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

pocketdimension.name: Pocket Dimension
pocketdimension.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be an Alternate card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

quantummouse.name: Quantum Mouse
quantummouse.description: Guarantees an additional card pull, with a chance of **Triple Clicking** with the **Fixed Mouse** equipped. The additional pull can only be of Ultra Rare rarity or lower. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

replacementvoid.name: Replacement Void
replacementvoid.description: The contents of the Peculiar Box get replaced with a random selection of cards.

xraygoggles.name: X-ray Goggles
xraygoggles.description: Sends you a DM with the current contents of the Peculiar Box

scratchoffticket.name: Scratch-off Ticket
scratchoffticket.description: Comes in a pack of 3. Very small chance to win a large quantity of tokens upon use.

giftairstrike.name: Gift Air Strike
giftairstrike.description: Gives 30 random people a copy of a random card from your inventory.

megaphone.name: Megaphone
megaphone.description: Sends a message in #trading-cards from the RDCards bot.

s1booster.name: Nostalgic Booster
s1booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 1. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s1booster.text_en: You tear open the **Nostalgic Booster.** Inside is some dust and un-embedded images.
s1booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Nostalgic Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 먼지와 임베드되지 않은 이미지가 들어 있다.

s2booster.name: Customized Booster
s2booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 2. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s2booster.text_en: You tear open the **Customized Booster.** Inside is a pencil and some certificates.
s2booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Customized Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 연필과 상장 몇개가 들어 있다.

s3booster.name: Pixelated Booster
s3booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 3. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s3booster.text_en: You tear open the **Pixelated Booster.** Inside is some old video games and a coffee bean.
s3booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Pixelated Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 옛날 게임과 커피콩이 들어 있다.

s4booster.name: Released Booster
s4booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 4. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s4booster.text_en: You tear open the **Released Booster.** Inside is a new game engine and seven years.
s4booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Released Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 새로운 게임 엔진과 7년이 들어 있다.

s5booster.name: Alternative Booster
s5booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 5. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s5booster.text_en: You tear open the **Alternative Booster.** Inside is a damp cloth and optimized network code.
s5booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Alternative Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 젖은 천과 최적화된 네트워크 코드가 들어 있다.

s6booster.name: Diverse Booster
s6booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 6. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s6booster.text_en: You tear open the **Diverse Booster.** Inside is some pins and a pair of programming socks.
s6booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Diverse Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 몇몇 핀과 프로그래밍 양말 한 짝이 들어 있다.

s7booster.name: Animal Booster
s7booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 7. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s7booster.text_en: You tear open the **Animal Booster.** Inside is some fur and a sheet of economics homework.
s7booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Animal Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 털과 경제학 숙제 한 장이 들어 있다.

s8booster.name: Planetary Booster
s8booster.description: Guarantees a **Triple Click** with cards from Season 8. Does not reduce pull cooldowns. You can only use one item of this type at a time.
s8booster.text_en: You tear open the **Planetary Booster.** Inside is some space dust. A lot of space dust, actually.
s8booster.text_ko: 당신은 **Planetary Booster**의 봉지를 열었다. 안에는 소량의 우주 먼지가 들어있다. 다시 보니, 매우 다량의 우주 먼지다.

gun.name: Toy Gun
gun.description: The next rob you commit is guaranteed to succeed, but gets blacklisted for 2 more restocks.

granolabar.name: Granola Bar
granolabar.description: Decreases all of your cooldowns by 3 hours.

hauntedgrass.name: Haunted Grass
hauntedgrass.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be horror themed. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

subwayticket.name: Subway Ticket
subwayticket.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

ddd.description: Allows you to unstore a single card with c!use .../(CARD)

essenceofgranolabar.name: Essence of Granola Bar
essenceofgranolabar.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.

essenceofhauntedgrass.name: Essence of Haunted Grass
essenceofhauntedgrass.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.

essenceofsparecryopod.name: Essence of Spare Cryopod
essenceofsparecryopod.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.

essenceofaceofhearts.name: Essence of Ace of Hearts
essenceofaceofhearts.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.

essenceofsubwayticket.name: Essence of Subway Ticket
essenceofsubwayticket.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.

essenceofddd.name: Essence of...
essenceofddd.description: Cannot be used. Marks your participation in an event.
